form.label: Agent Logins
form.description: View statistics and summaries for Agent login sessions

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queue_agent_logins" earliest=$tkn_extra_earliest_time$ latest=$tkn_extra_latest_time$ | dedup host, idcallcent_ag_queuestatus | transaction host q_num agent_num startswith="is_loggedin_in_queue=t" endswith="is_loggedin_in_queue=f" keepevicted=t | search eventcount=2 | eval login_time=strptime(mvindex(timeofupdate,0), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), logout_time=strptime(mvindex(timeofupdate,1), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | dedup host, agent_num, q_num, login_time | eval login_time=if(login_time<$tkn_earliest_time$, $tkn_earliest_time$, login_time) | where login_time<logout_time | eval duration=logout_time-login_time | fields - _raw | fields _time, agent_*, duration, eventcount, host, idcallcent_ag_queuestatus, is_loggedin_in_all_queues, is_loggedin_in_queue, login_time, logout_time, q_name, q_num, user_id, timeofupdate | table _time, agent_*, duration, eventcount, host, idcallcent_ag_queuestatus, is_loggedin_in_all_queues, is_loggedin_in_queue, login_time, logout_time, q_name, q_num, user_id, timeofupdate
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls" $o_name$ | dedup host, q_num | eval fqname = q_name+" ("+q_num+")" | sort + q_name

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queue_agent_logins" is_loggedin_in_queue=t ($o_name$) ($queue_field$) | dedup host, agent_num | eval AgentE = agent_fname + " " + agent_lname + " (Ext."+agent_num+")" | fields host, agent_num, AgentE | table AgentE, agent_num | sort + AgentE

panel.title: Average Time Spent Logged in per Queue

search.query: | search $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | stats avg(duration) as duration by q_name | eval "Avg Time" = round(duration/60,3) | fields - duration | rename q_name as Queue | sort - "Avg Time"

panel.title: Top/Bottom 10 Agents with total Queue Time

search.query: | search $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | dedup host, agent_num, login_time | eval Agent = agent_fname + " " + agent_lname | stats sum(duration) as duration by Agent | eval Time = round(duration/3600,2) | sort $sort_sign$ Time | rename Time AS "Hours " | head 10

| search $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | eval qq = q_name+" ("+q_num+")" | eval Agent = agent_fname + " " + agent_lname | stats values(q_num) as Qlist, dc(logout_time) as logins, avg(duration) as AvgTLIn, latest(logout_time) as lastactive, sum(duration) as TotTLIn values(qq) as Queues by Agent | eval ToLIn = tostring(TotTLIn,"duration") | rex field=ToLIn "(?<dayAndHours>.*)\:(?<mins>\d+)\:(?<secs>\d+)" | eval TTot1 = "("+replace(dayAndHours,"\+","d ")+"h "+mins+"m "+secs+"s )" | eval ToLIn = round(TotTLIn/3600,2) | eval ToLIn = ToLIn+" hours "+TTot1 | eval ToTLIn = tostring(AvgTLIn,"duration") | rex field=ToTLIn "(?<dayAndHours2>.*)\:(?<mins2>\d+)\:(?<secs2>\d+)" | eval TAvg1 = "("+replace(dayAndHours2,"\+","d ")+"h "+mins2+"m "+secs2+"s )" | eval ToTLIn = round(AvgTLIn/3600,2) | eval ToTLIn = ToTLIn+" hours "+TAvg1 | eval lastactive = strftime(lastactive,"%a %I:%M %p %z, %b %d %Y") | table Agent, Queues, lastactive, logins, ToLIn, ToTLIn | join Agent [search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls" $queue_field$ $o_name$ earliest=$tkn_earliest_time$ latest=$tkn_latest_time$ | eval Agent = agent_fname + " " + agent_lname | eval svc = if(isserviced=1,1,0) | stats sum(svc) as "Calls Serviced" by Agent ] | rename ToLIn as "Total Time Spent Logged In", ToTLIn as "Avg Time Spent Logged In", logins as "# of Logins", lastactive as "Last Time Active"

panel.title: Average Time Spent Logged into Queue

search.query: | search $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | dedup host, agent_num, login_time | eval Agent = agent_fname + " " + agent_lname | stats avg(duration) AS agg BY Agent | eval agg = round(agg/3600,2) | sort $srtavg$ agg | head 10 | rename agg as "Average Hours"

| search $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | dedup host, agent_num, login_time | eval Agent = agent_fname + " " + agent_lname | eval dur = duration*1000 | stats count by login_time, dur, Agent | table login_time Agent dur

| search $queue_field$ $o_name$ $agnts$ | eval Agent = agent_fname + " " + agent_lname | sort + login_time | eval LoginTime = strftime(login_time,"%b %d, %Y %I:%M %p") | eval LogoutTime = strftime(logout_time,"%b %d, %Y %I:%M %p") | eval qq = q_name+" ("+q_num+")" | stats values(qq) as qq by LogoutTime, agent_num, LoginTime, Agent | sort - LogoutTime | rename qq AS "Queue(s)", agent_num AS Extension, LoginTime AS "Time of Login", LogoutTime AS "Logged out at" | Table "Time of Login", Agent, Extension, "Queue(s)","Logged out at"
